caption.p:
(1st row) Binary maps of a CoV particle with varying ROIs: (left panel) 115 × 115 pixels, and (right panel) 125 × 125 pixels. The corresponding log–log plots of box size versus number of boxes (2nd row). The slope of the fitted straight line gives the D value, expressed as mean
±
SD. Note a slight improvement in the fit with a change in ROI, as seen from the plot shown in right. The units of variables used are arbitrary.
